property.name: text
property.value: Model of two balls with the same mass that are touching and not moving at first. At time 1, a force is applied to the left mass to start it moving.

property.name: setActions
text
property.value: Note that if F_r > F_l, we will leave this mode, so here we can assume F_r <= F_l.

property.name: text
property.value: Any impulsive force will cause us to leave this mode, so we ignore impulsive inputs.

property.name: text
property.value: Behavior when the two balls are acting as one and traveling together.

property.name: text
property.value: Behavior when the two balls are traveling independently.
